author: Christopher Brito
title: Church leader dies of COVID-19 after ignoring guidance
description: "God is larger than this dreaded virus," Bishop Gerald Glenn told his congregation in Virginia last month.
content: The leader of a church in Virginia who defied social distancing guidelines to hold services for his congregation last month has died of complications from COVID-19. The death of Bishop Gerald Glenn, the leader of New Deliverance Evangelistic Church in Richmon… [+1465 chars]
